blog.title: Tony Stark/Steve Rogers

summary: Therapeutic Objectification
title: Therapeutic Objectification
body:
by Hammocker

A single sound rang over and over through the room. Hard flesh on hard canvas. Pound, pound, pound, on and on. It sent ripples of tension through the room, all radiating from the one making those sounds. Steve had some stress to work out, pent up from all the small things that weighed on his conscience throughout the week. Tony was more than willing to help.

Words: 2754, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

summary: what do you think Harley and Peter's favorite colors are? Do they clash? Do they fight about them??
question: what do you think Harley and Peter's favorite colors are? Do they clash? Do they fight about them??
answer:
ok you already know peter’s is 100% red because he idolizes people associated with red in his life SO much. Tony and his suit, May and her whole personality of love and caring, Cap (before that whole shit show) for his shield, and so on and so forth. Even himself. Well, not himself, Spider-Man, this person-this Character-that he’s created of who he want’s most to be, because whether he truly knows it or not, he sees himself and spidey as a lesser and a goal, but he’s already there.

and harley’s is…pink. I’m not kidding. Pink is the color of Abby; pink is the color of that limited edition watch that he gave tony, their connection;pink is love and home and safety; and most importantly (not) pink is the color than he spray painted the local high school bully’s car to spite him.

harley tries to tell peter that his favorite color is black like the edge lord he is, but… he’s a bad liar.

peter arguing with the truth of that statement usually results in peter upside down in harley’s face until they kiss or peter falls on his head.

do they clash? depends on the shade? ;)

Me:
Don't get me wrong! I absolutely love Loki, there are just so many...
body:
Someone: Nah, I watch Marvel movies only for Loki!

Me:

Don’t get me wrong! I absolutely love Loki, there are just so many amazing characters in the “Marvel Universe” and… ok it’s just my shitty opinion, do whatever you want and don’t kill me plz *kneels*

summary: Does the walker choose the path, or does the path choose the walker?
title: Does the walker choose the path, or does the path choose the walker?
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2XbgMBK

by StarxRox

It’s common that people receive glimpses of their own futures when they encounter the other person, who’s featured in it.

They get a mark which resembles a firebrand and called the Destined.

Must be nice. Right.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Fall On Me With All Your Light
title: Fall On Me With All Your Light
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2IHxnnJ

by ladynerdynerd (sparrowsword)

“Rhodey, what’s – ”

“There’s been an accident. I was one of the first to respond to the call, it’s…” Rhodey sighed, a short exhale of fragile air. “Tony, it’s Ben and May – ”

The table lamp clattered to the floor as Tony reached out a hand to brace himself, all of a sudden feeling like he was tumbling sideways even though he was sat completely still. He knew Rhodey was still talking but it was all white noise, lost in the ferocious buzzing inside his head. His heart clenched dangerously and he drew in a rough breath, thoughts whirling round and round until they crashed onto one single thing.

“Peter,” he gasped.

 
In the wake of a devestating tragedy, Tony can only hold on for dear life as the walls come tumbling down.

Words: 3446, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Iron Man (Movies), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Peter Parker, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Bruce Banner, Thor (Marvel), Ben Parker
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, James “Rhodey” Rhodes & Tony Stark, Tony Stark & Thor, Bruce Banner & Tony Stark, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark

summary: Therapeutic Objectification
title: Therapeutic Objectification
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2IBhE9x

by Hammocker

A single sound rang over and over through the room. Hard flesh on hard canvas. Pound, pound, pound, on and on. It sent ripples of tension through the room, all radiating from the one making those sounds. Steve had some stress to work out, pent up from all the small things that weighed on his conscience throughout the week. Tony was more than willing to help.

blog.name: dormammuivecometobargain
blog.title: I'm a slut for DC and Marvel
blog.description: Name's Athena, mildly insane, and a bit too obsessed with DC and Marvel Ao3 | Wattpad

tags: here are my random ass shit thoughts for y'all
summary: Since everyone is making 2012 Avengers headcanons after Endgame did what it did to it, lemme propose one of my own.  Imagine...
body:
Since everyone is making 2012 Avengers headcanons after Endgame did what it did to it, lemme propose one of my own. 

Imagine that the Avengers pull up footage from traffic cams after the battle of New York to make sure they didn’t miss any alien robots. 

And imagine them seeing fucking Captain America and Iron Man, plus some dude wearing Hank’s old suit, all arguing like an old married couple. Like, imagine the pure confusion and utter shock they would experience.

Or, seeing footage of that same Tony Stark lookin dude and the guy in the costume, just fucking trying to run away with the tesseract, only to get demolished by the Hulk and accidently give it to Loki instead. 

2012 Avengers are wild y’all.

blog.name: natashastarkotp
blog.title: NatashaStark
blog.description:
Trying to keep tonynat alive. Y’all sleeping on a power couple here.

Header made by @kelslk-art

IronWidow focus but ships Tony with pretty much everyone else so expect some other pairings. She/Her.

summary:
*Parenting training*
Tony: What the frak?
Natasha: Good.
Tony: I don’t give a flying duck.
Natasha: Okay.
Tony: Holy schnikes....
body:
*Parenting training*

Tony: What the frak?

Natasha: Good.

Tony: I don’t give a flying duck.

Natasha: Okay.

Tony: Holy schnikes.

Natasha: Very good.

Tony: Mother puffin.

Natasha: Great.

Tony: Fuc-

Natasha, spraying him with water: NO.
